reviewText: it arrived real fast and I was very happy I enjoyed this movie and kept watching it cuz I like the action movies not a big fan like I am you would love this movie

Are you serious?! This was one of the best weapons and all around martial arts movie EVER. Sammo and Lau Kar Wing were at thier best. And Leung Kar Yan was absolutely amazing. I have about 70 or so of some of the best kung fu flicks in my collection. This is top 5. Loved it. Thx
Stephon
